arguments.value: [Dashboard] `closeAfterFinish: true` cannot be used on an inline Dashboard, because an inline Dashboard cannot be closed at all. Either set `inline: false`, or disable the `closeAfterFinish` option.
[Dashboard] When using `closeAfterFinish`, we recommended setting the `allowMultipleUploadBatches` option to `false` in the Uppy constructor. See https://uppy.io/docs/uppy/#allowMultipleUploads-true
